ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] My wishlist on the interface
ygData.msgSnippet: ... the ... someone ... Lets ... That s why I wish a rapier/dirk combo would stay effective as I got higher, it just looks SO WICKED :) (actually it s FS
ygData.messageBody:
>From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
>I carry 20 throwing knives - carry over from before Bellow - for pulling
>mobs out of a hopefully lulled crowd. Plus I like the idea of throwing a
>dagger <eg> If I loot rustys, I'll throw them for fun. And now pass me
the
>cheese, I am about to whine...
>
><waaa> I wish bards could equip bows! I think it looks so cool when
someone
>shoots a bow and arrow! And looking cool is most important for bards!
Lets
>petition them and get SoW made slower and bow and arrows for bards! <eg>
>
><mmm nice camembert>
>


That's why I wish a rapier/dirk combo would stay effective as I got higher,
it just looks SO WICKED :)

(actually it's FS Rapier + Parrying dagger for another 4bubbles, then time
to purchase
a dragoon dirk)

Tindayen
(Povar)
